overview.title: A Simple Bookmark Manager
overview.description: A clean and simple interface to organize your favorites websites. Open a new browser tab and see your sites load instantly. Try it for free.

features.title: Features
features.description: Our aim is to make it quick and easy for you to access your favorites websites. Your bookmarks sync between your devices so you can access them on the go.

details.title: Bookmark in one click
details.description: Organize your bookmarks however you like. Our simple drag-and-drop interface gives you complete control over how you manage your favorite sites.
details.label: Simple Bookmarking

details.title: Intelligent search
details.description: Our powerful search feature will help you find saved sites in no time at all. No need to trawl through all of your bookmarks.
details.label: Speedy Searching

details.title: Share your bookmarks
details.description: Easily share your bookmarks and collections with others. Create a shareable link that you can send at the click of a button.
details.label: Easy Sharing

download.title: Download the extension
download.description: We've got more browsers in the pipeline. Please do let us know if you've got a favorite you'd like us to prioritize.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here are some of our FAQs. If you have any other questions you'd like answered please feel free to email us.
